研究受精 ACL 手术对运动员重返赛场的影响马歇尔大学琼·C·爱德华兹医学院现正在接受一项观察性试验的申请者，该试验的重点是受精前十字韧带 (ACL) 重建。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Investigating-ifered-ACL-surgerys-impact-on-return-to-play-in-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Investigating-ifered-ACL-surgerys-impact-on-return-to-play-in-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=593ff554-bc08-4568-b85c-86401d72db01 Thu, 02 May 2024 16:30:48 -0400 Investigating fertilized ACL surgery's impact on return to play in athletes
蛋白质分析揭示衰老和阻力训练对骨骼肌蛋白质组的影响一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 8 期，题为“A new deep proteomic method in human skeletal肌肉揭示了受衰老和阻力训练影响的独特分子特征。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Protein-profiling-reveals-impact-of-aging-and-resistance-training-on-skeletal-muscle-proteome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Protein-profiling-reveals-impact-of-aging-and-resistance-training-on-skeletal-muscle-proteome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbf4a1ac-b401-4ff0-b9e9-f8231c7ace6e Thu, 02 May 2024 16:26:30 -0400 Protein profiling reveals impact of aging and resistance training on skeletal muscle proteome
DIY凝胶美甲可能会损害你的健康在舒适的家中准备一套新鲜的套装？ DIY 凝胶指甲在社交媒体上风靡一时，但这种做法可能会导致你患上改变生活的过敏症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/DIY-gel-manicures-may-harm-your-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/DIY-gel-manicures-may-harm-your-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afa7939b-ecb5-47a1-b3ed-10482e9b3902 Thu, 02 May 2024 16:20:57 -0400 DIY gel manicures may harm your health

小罗伯特·肯尼迪 (Robert F. Kennedy Jr.) 关于禁止 NIH 研究大规模枪击事件的说法是错误的​美国国立卫生研究院是联邦政府支持医学研究的主要机构。它是否被禁止研究大规模枪击事件？这是总统候选人小罗伯特·F·肯尼迪最近所说的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Robert-F-Kennedy-Jr-Is-Wrong-About-A-Ban-On-NIH-Research-About-Mass-Shootings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Robert-F-Kennedy-Jr-Is-Wrong-About-A-Ban-On-NIH-Research-About-Mass-Shootings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e84cb1a-8c55-4ba2-b329-d91fd86c30d1 Thu, 02 May 2024 16:15:00 -0400 Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is wrong about a ban on NIH research about mass shootings
雄性小鼠的生态失调影响后代健康和胎盘发育肠道微生物群是占据胃肠道的微生物群落。它负责产生对宿主代谢和对环境做出反应至关重要的酶、代谢物和其他分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Dysbiosis-in-male-mice-affects-offspring-health-and-placental-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Dysbiosis-in-male-mice-affects-offspring-health-and-placental-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7919f57e-0212-4b44-9620-1ca08758dbd3 Thu, 02 May 2024 14:33:12 -0400 Dysbiosis in male mice affects offspring health and placental development
研究发现糖工程干细胞可增强心脏骤停后的大脑恢复马里兰大学医学院的研究人员发现了干细胞疗法的一项创新，可以在动物模型心脏骤停后再生大脑中的神经细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Glycoengineered-stem-cells-enhance-brain-recovery-after-cardiac-arrest-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Glycoengineered-stem-cells-enhance-brain-recovery-after-cardiac-arrest-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a5958e3-8aaf-4291-b031-9e2efb912493 Thu, 02 May 2024 14:25:23 -0400 Glycoengineered stem cells enhance brain recovery after cardiac arrest, study finds
研究显示，收入不平等与预期寿命 10 年差距有关过去40年来，美国贫富之间的健康、死亡率以及收入差距持续扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Income-inequality-linked-to-10-year-gap-in-life-expectancy-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Income-inequality-linked-to-10-year-gap-in-life-expectancy-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c00045e8-a315-44b1-b590-5254167007df Thu, 02 May 2024 14:17:00 -0400 Income inequality linked to 10-year gap in life expectancy, study reveals
AI 模型模仿随机临床试验来确定最佳的中风预防治疗科学家设计了一种新的人工智能模型，可以模拟随机临床试验，以确定最有效预防心脏病患者中风的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/AI-model-mimics-randomized-clinical-trials-for-确定-optimal-中风-预防-治疗.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/AI-model-mimics-randomized-clinical-trials-for-确定-optimal-中风-预防-治疗.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33cf6d5e-8eb6-4b7b-917e-3836018212a3 Thu, 02 May 2024 14:11:21 -0400 AI model mimics randomized clinical trials for determining optimal stroke prevention treatment
新疫苗方法有望针对流感病毒变异较小的区域杜克大学的研究人员开发了一种疫苗，鼓励免疫系统针对病毒表面变化较小的部分，为攻击流感病毒开辟了一条新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-vaccine-approach-shows-promise-in-targeting-less-variable-region-of-influenza-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-vaccine-approach-shows-promise-in-targeting-less-variable-region-of-influenza-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=970513d1-c02b-4ca6-908e-428b79de1481 Thu, 02 May 2024 13:53:18 -0400 New vaccine approach shows promise in targeting less variable region of influenza virus
